product_meta.title: DeLonghi BGR50 De'Longhi Reversible Grill/Griddle, Black
product_meta.description:
Grill up some fresh chicken or flip up a serving of flapjacks with this all-in-one electric grill and griddle. Made from die cast aluminum with a nonstick coating, it has a large reversible grill and griddle plate. An embedded heating element makes sure you achieve even heat distribution, while an adjustable and removable thermostat allows you to choose the ideal temperature for grilling various dishes. Use the ribbed grill side for steaks, burgers, and chicken or use the flat griddle side for pancakes, bacon, and eggs. Promoting healthy eating, this grill and griddle includes removable fat collection tray. Perfect for indoor or outdoor use, this grill and griddle can be raised to different height preferences, transported with cool-touch handles, and is dishwasher safe for an easy clean up.

12-3/5" L x 19-7/10" W x 4-3/10" H
feature_bullets: Large, reversible, and heavy-duty die-cast aluminum grill and griddle plate with embedded heating element
Ribbed side-Ideal for optimal grilled meats and fish (steaks, chops, hamburgers, sausages, salmon, etc.)
(Flat side) Ideal for healthy vegetables cooked on the plate, delicious eggs and bacon, omelets and cheese on the plate
The plate is easy to clean and dishwasher safe
The adjustable thermostat from 200 Degree F (93 Degree C) to 400 Degree F (204 Degree C) and keep warm function, allows maximum precision for cooking
